text: unkalilirunte avan unkalukkaka or utaranattai etuttuk kurukiran; unkal valakkaram urimaippatuttik kontavarkalil (atimaikalil) evaraiyum, nam unkaluk alittiruppa(tana campat)til unkalutan pankalikalaka akkik kontu atil avarkalutan camamaka irukkirirkala? Unkalaip ponrorukku payappatuvataippol avarkalai payappatukirirkala? Ivvarakave nam nam attatcikalai cintittunarum camukattirku vivarikkirom
